      • getRequestParameters

        static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> getRequestParameters​(java.net.URI requestUri)
        Extracts parameters and their values from the URI

        This method uses regular expression to split the uri into multiple parts. First regex splits and find the parameters and their values. The next regex splits for =, which separates the parameter and the parameter value.

        Parameters:
        requestUri - - the URI that the method gets the parameters from.
        Returns:
        a Map of the paramaters and their values

        static boolean isDouble​(java.lang.String x)
        Method to check for whether a value is a double or not
        Parameters:
        x - - a value in String format to be checked
        Returns:
        true if x is a double, false if it isn't

      • isInt

        static boolean isInt​(java.lang.String x)
        Method to check for whether a value is an integer or not
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        true if x is an integer, false if it isn't
